001package net.tvburger.jdl.adaline;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Floats;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.DefaultNeuralNetwork;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.InputNeuron;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron;
007
008import java.util.ArrayList;
009import java.util.List;
010
011public class Adaline extends DefaultNeuralNetwork {
012
013    public static Adaline create(int inputs, int outputs) {
014        List<InputNeuron> inputNodes = new ArrayList<>();
015        for (int i = 0; i < inputs; i++) {
016            inputNodes.add(new InputNeuron("Input(" + i + ")"));
017        }
018        List<Neuron> outputNodes = new ArrayList<>();
019        for (int i = 0; i < outputs; i++) {
020            outputNodes.add(Neuron.create("Adaline(" + i + ")", inputNodes));
021        }
022        return new Adaline(List.of(inputNodes, outputNodes));
023    }
024
025    private Adaline(List<List<? extends Neuron>> layers) {
026        super(layers);
027    }
028
029    public boolean[] classify(Float[] inputs) {
030        Float[] estimate = estimate(inputs);
031        boolean[] classifications = new boolean[estimate.length];
032        for (int i = 0; i < estimate.length; i++) {
033            classifications[i] = Floats.greaterThan(estimate[i], 0.0f);
034        }
035        return classifications;
036    }
037
038}
